StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMonthlyAc.vityReportAppointRow]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@StartDate date.me, @EndDate date.me, @ORG_ID int, @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR int AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
Declare @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE date.me Declare @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE date.me Declare @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE date.me Declare @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE date.me Declare @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE date.me Declare @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE date.me Declare @PLC_NFO varchar(2) Declare @PLC_GROUND varchar(2) Declare @PLC_NA varchar(2) Declare @PLC_LAW varchar(2) Declare @OCC_NFO varchar(2) Declare @OCC_GROUND varchar(2) Declare @OCC_NA varchar(2) Declare @OCCR_GROUND varchar(2) Declare @OCC_LAW varchar(2)
Declare @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS1 int Declare @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS2 int Declare @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS3 int
Declare @OCC_FIRST_CLASS_NUMBER int Declare @OCC_SECOND_CLASS_NUMBER int Declare @OCC_THIRD_CLASS_NUMBER int
set @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS1 = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR + 1; set @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS2 = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR + 2; set @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS3 = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR + 3;
set @PLC_NFO = '0A'; set @PLC_GROUND = '0B'; set @PLC_NA = '0C'; set @PLC_LAW = '0E'; set @OCC_LAW = '1A'; set @OCC_GROUND = '1B'; set @OCC_NA = '1C'; set @OCCR_GROUND = '1E'; set @OCC_NFO = '1H';
CREATE TABLE #RESULTS ( -- RowType varchar(10), PLC1_NFO_ALL INT default 0, PLC1_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, PLC1_GROUND_ALL INT default 0, PLC1_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, PLC1_AIR_ALL INT default 0, PLC1_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, PLC1_LAW_ALL INT default 0, PLC1_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, PLC2_NFO_ALL INT default 0, PLC2_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, PLC2_GROUND_ALL INT default 0, PLC2_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, PLC2_AIR_ALL INT default 0, PLC2_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, PLC2_LAW_ALL INT default 0, PLC2_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, PLC3_NFO_ALL INT default 0, PLC3_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, PLC3_GROUND_ALL INT default 0, PLC3_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, PLC3_AIR_ALL INT default 0, PLC3_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, PLC3_LAW_ALL INT default 0, PLC3_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, OCC1_NFO_ALL INT default 0, OCC1_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, OCCR1_GROUND_ALL INT default 0, OCCR1_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, OCC1_GROUND_ALL INT default 0, OCC1_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, OCC1_AIR_ALL INT default 0, OCC1_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, OCC1_LAW_ALL INT default 0, OCC1_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, OCC2_NFO_ALL INT default 0, OCC2_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, OCCR2_GROUND_ALL INT default 0, OCCR2_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, OCC2_GROUND_ALL INT default 0, OCC2_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, OCC2_AIR_ALL INT default 0, OCC2_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, OCC2_LAW_ALL INT default 0, OCC2_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, OCC3_NFO_ALL INT default 0, OCC3_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, OCCR3_GROUND_ALL INT default 0, OCCR3_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, OCC3_GROUND_ALL INT default 0, OCC3_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, OCC3_AIR_ALL INT default 0, OCC3_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0, OCC3_LAW_ALL INT default 0, OCC3_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE INT default 0 )
select @OCC_FIRST_CLASS_NUMBER = ( select min(CLASS_NUMBER) from MCRISS.dbo.OCS_CLASS where FISCAL_YEAR = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR and TRAINING_TYPE_CODE = 'OCC');
select @OCC_SECOND_CLASS_NUMBER = @OCC_FIRST_CLASS_NUMBER +1; select @OCC_THIRD_CLASS_NUMBER = @OCC_FIRST_CLASS_NUMBER +2;
CREATE TABLE #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY ( ProspectId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,DiversityCode VARCHAR(10) ,MissionYear int, TrainingType varchar(7), FiscalYear int, ClassIncrement int, Program varchar(7) )
SET @StartDate = CAST( (STR(Year(@StartDate)) + '-' + STR(MONTH(@StartDate)) + '-' + STR(DAY(@StartDate)) ) AS date.me)
SET @EndDate = CAST( (STR(Year(@EndDate)) + '-' + STR(MONTH(@EndDate)) + '-' + STR(DAY(@EndDate)) ) AS date.me) SET @EndDate = DATEADD(day, 1, @EndDate)
select * into #Event from RSSOSS.USMC.Event e WHERE @Org_Id IS NOT NULL AND e.Organiza.onId = @Org_Id AND (e.StartDate between @StartDate AND @EndDate)
SELECT DISTINCT s.* INTO #EventSubject FROM RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s INNER JOIN #Event e ON e.ID = s.EventId
SELECT DISTINCT oc.* INTO #EventOutcome FROM RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc INNER JOIN #Event e ON e.ID = oc.EventId
SELECT P.* INTO #Prospect FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.PROSPECT P INNER JOIN #EventSubject es on p.ProspectId = es.SubjectId -- AND RO.Organiza.on_Id = @Org_Id
INSERT INTO #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY(ProspectId ,MissionYear ,TrainingType ,FiscalYear ,ClassIncrement ,Program ,DiversityCode ) SELECT pro.ProspectId, OPP.MissionYear, OPP.TrainingType, OPP.FiscalYear, opp.ClassIncrement, opp.Program ,CASE WHEN opp.Diversity IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN per.Race IN ('A','B','D','F') THEN 'O' WHEN per.Race = 'C' THEN 'AA' WHEN per.Race = 'E' AND per.Ethnicity IN ('1','4','6','9') THEN 'H' WHEN per.Race = 'E' AND per.Ethnicity = 'P' THEN 'W' WHEN per.Race = 'E' AND per.Ethnicity NOT IN ('1','4','6','9', 'P') THEN 'O' WHEN per.Race = 'E' AND per.Ethnicity IS NULL THEN 'O' WHEN per.Race IS NULL THEN 'O' END ELSE CASE WHEN opp.Diversity IN ('A','B','D','F') THEN 'O' WHEN opp.Diversity = 'C' THEN 'AA' WHEN opp.Diversity = 'E' AND opp.EthnicCode IN ('1','4','6','9') THEN 'H' WHEN opp.Diversity = 'E' AND opp.EthnicCode = 'P' THEN 'W' WHEN opp.Diversity = 'E' AND opp.EthnicCode NOT IN ('1','4','6','9', 'P') THEN 'O' WHEN opp.Diversity = 'E' AND opp.EthnicCode IS NULL THEN 'O' END --ELSE THEN 'AW' END AS DiversityCode FROM #Prospect pro LEFT OUTER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.O.cerProspectPac opp ON pro.ProspectId = opp.ProspectId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Person per ON pro.PersonId = per.PersonId
INSERT INTO #RESULTS ---- Select PLC 1 SELECT ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.program=@PLC_NFO and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCCOMB' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS1 and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC1_NFO_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.program=@PLC_NFO and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCCOMB' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS1 and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC1_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.program= @PLC_GROUND and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCCOMB' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS1 and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC1_GROUND_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.program= @PLC_GROUND and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCCOMB' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS1 and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC1_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.program= @PLC_NA and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCCOMB' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS1 and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC1_AIR_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.program= @PLC_NA and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCCOMB' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS1 and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC1_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.program= @PLC_LAW and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCCOMB' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS1 and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC1_LAW_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.program= @PLC_LAW and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCCOMB' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS1 and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC1_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE, ----SELECT PLC 2 ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.program=@PLC_NFO and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCJR' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS2 and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC2_NFO_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.program=@PLC_NFO and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCJR' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS2 and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC2_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @PLC_GROUND and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCJR' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS2 and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC2_GROUND_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @PLC_GROUND and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCJR' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS2 and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC2_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @PLC_NA and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCJR' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS2 and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC2_AIR_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @PLC_NA and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCJR' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS2 and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC2_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @PLC_LAW and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCJR' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS2 and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC2_LAW_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @PLC_LAW and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCJR' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS2 and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC2_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE, ----SELECT PLC 3 ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program=@PLC_NFO and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCJR' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS3 and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC3_NFO_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program=@PLC_NFO and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCJR' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS3 and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC3_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @PLC_GROUND and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCJR' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS3 and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC3_GROUND_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @PLC_GROUND and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCJR' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS3 and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC3_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @PLC_NA and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCJR' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS3 and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC3_AIR_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @PLC_NA and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCJR' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS3 and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC3_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @PLC_LAW and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCJR' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS3 and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC3_LAW_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @PLC_LAW and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'PLCJR' and pd.MissionYear = @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR_PLUS3 and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS PLC3_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE, ----Select OCC year 1 ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program=@OCC_NFO and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_FIRST_CLASS_NUMBER and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC1_NFO_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program=@OCC_NFO and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_FIRST_CLASS_NUMBER and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC1_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCCR_GROUND and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_FIRST_CLASS_NUMBER and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCCR1_GROUND_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCCR_GROUND and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_FIRST_CLASS_NUMBER and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCCR1_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCC_GROUND and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_FIRST_CLASS_NUMBER and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC1_GROUND_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCC_GROUND and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_FIRST_CLASS_NUMBER and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC1_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCC_NA and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_FIRST_CLASS_NUMBER and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC1_AIR_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCC_NA and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_FIRST_CLASS_NUMBER and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC1_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCC_LAW and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_FIRST_CLASS_NUMBER and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC1_LAW_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCC_LAW and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_FIRST_CLASS_NUMBER and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC1_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE, --SELECT OCC year 2 ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program=@OCC_NFO and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_SECOND_CLASS_NUMBER and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC2_NFO_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program=@OCC_NFO and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_SECOND_CLASS_NUMBER and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC2_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCCR_GROUND and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_SECOND_CLASS_NUMBER and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCCR1_GROUND_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCCR_GROUND and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_SECOND_CLASS_NUMBER and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCCR1_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCC_GROUND and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_SECOND_CLASS_NUMBER and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC2_GROUND_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCC_GROUND and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_SECOND_CLASS_NUMBER and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC2_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCC_NA and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_SECOND_CLASS_NUMBER and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC2_AIR_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCC_NA and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_SECOND_CLASS_NUMBER and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC2_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCC_LAW and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_SECOND_CLASS_NUMBER and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC2_LAW_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCC_LAW and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_SECOND_CLASS_NUMBER and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC2_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE, --SELECT OCC year 3
ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program=@OCC_NFO and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_THIRD_CLASS_NUMBER and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC3_NFO_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program=@OCC_NFO and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_THIRD_CLASS_NUMBER and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC3_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCCR_GROUND and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_SECOND_CLASS_NUMBER and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCCR1_GROUND_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCCR_GROUND and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_THIRD_CLASS_NUMBER and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCCR1_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCC_GROUND and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_SECOND_CLASS_NUMBER and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC3_GROUND_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCC_GROUND and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_THIRD_CLASS_NUMBER and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC3_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCC_NA and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_THIRD_CLASS_NUMBER and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC3_AIR_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCC_NA and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_THIRD_CLASS_NUMBER and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC3_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCC_LAW and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_SECOND_CLASS_NUMBER and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC3_LAW_ALL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (pd.Program= @OCC_LAW and pd.TRAININGTYPE = 'OCC' and pd.ClassIncrement = @OCC_THIRD_CLASS_NUMBER and pd.DiversityCode <>'W' and e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS OCC3_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE
FROM #Event e INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventPersonVisibility v ON e.ID = v.EventId INNER JOIN #EventSubject s ON e.ID = s.EventId RIGHT OUTER JOIN #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY pd ON s.subjectId = pd.ProspectId LEFT OUTER JOIN #EventOutcome oc ON e.ID = oc.EventId
SELECT * FROM #RESULTS
DROP TABLE #RESULTS DROP TABLE #Event DROP TABLE #EventSubject DROP TABLE #EventOutcome DROP TABLE #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY END
